product_name: The North Face Gritstone Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Combat strong winds during high-altitude adventures in The North Face Gritstone windproof soft-shell jacket for men. This jacket excels at mountaineering and alpine climbing. GORE WINDSTOPPER(R) exterior remains windproof without sacrificing breathability during stages of intense aerobic activity. Brushed tricot backing feels soft and wicks moisture. Pit zips allow you to instantly dump heat for immediate ventilation. Harness- and pack-friendly handwarmer pockets; 1 zippered bicep pocket. Pull the hidden hem cinch cord tighter to trap heat and seal out the elements. Closeout.
short_description: Combat strong winds during high-altitude adventures in The North Face Gritstone windproof soft-shell jacket for men. This jacket excels at mountaineering and alpine climbing.
